TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TextureBrush extends System.Drawing.Brush
Public NotInheritable Class TextureBrush Inherits Brush
public ref class TextureBrush sealed : System::Drawing::Brush

summary.span: 类的每个属性都是 对象，这种对象使用图像来填充形状的内部。

span.span: Each property of the class is a object that uses an image to fill the interior of a shape.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取新位图使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to obtain a new bitmap using the method. 它还演示了。It also demonstrates a . 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建包含名为 Button2 的按钮的窗体。Create a form containing a button named Button2. 将代码粘贴到窗体并将 Button2_Click 方法与按钮的`Click`事件。Paste the code into the form and associate the Button2_Click method with the button's `Click` event. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的`Paint`事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. 该代码会创建对象和该纹理画笔的一个精确副本，然后使用该副本来填充矩形屏幕上的。The code creates a object and an exact copy of that texture brush, and then uses the copy to fill a rectangle on the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

param.name: matrix

span.span: The object by which to multiply the geometric transformation.

summary.span: 通过预先计算指定的 对象，将表示此 对象的局部几何转换的 对象与指定 对象相乘。

span.span: Multiplies the object that represents the local geometric transformation of this object by the specified object by prepending the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 转换矩阵对象指定如何转换定义纹理的图像。The transformation matrix of a object specifies how the image that defines the texture is transformed. 例如，如果转换矩阵指定顺时针旋转 90 度的旋转，纹理图像被旋转顺时针旋转 90 度。For example, if the transformation matrix specifies a rotation of 90 degrees clockwise, the texture image is rotated by 90 degrees clockwise. ## Examples 下面的示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的`Paint`事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 创建新矩阵的指定沿 x 方向进行的 50 个单位的平移。Creates a new matrix that specifies a translation of 50 units in the x-direction. - 将纹理画笔的变换矩阵与矩阵相乘。Multiplies the matrix with the transformation matrix of the texture brush. - 填充的矩形，使用纹理画笔。Fills a rectangle, using the texture brush. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

.method public hidebysig instance void MultiplyTransform(class System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix matrix, valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder order) cil managed
public: void MultiplyTransform(System::Drawing::Drawing2D::Matrix ^ matrix, System::Drawing::Drawing2D::MatrixOrder order);

param.span: 要乘以几何转换的 对象。

span.span: The object by which to multiply the geometric transformation.

param.name: order
param.span: 用于指定两个矩阵相乘的顺序的 枚举。

span.span: A enumeration that specifies the order in which to multiply the two matrices.

summary.span: 将表示此 对象的局部几何转换的 对象与指定的 对象按指定顺序相乘。

span.span: Multiplies the object that represents the local geometric transformation of this object by the specified object in the specified order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 转换矩阵对象指定如何转换定义纹理的图像。The transformation matrix of a object specifies how the image that defines the texture is transformed. 例如，如果转换矩阵指定顺时针旋转 90 度的旋转，纹理图像被旋转顺时针旋转 90 度。For example, if the transformation matrix specifies a rotation of 90 degrees clockwise, the texture image is rotated by 90 degrees clockwise. ## Examples 下面的示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的`Paint`事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 创建新矩阵的指定沿 x 方向进行的 50 个单位的平移。Creates a new matrix that specifies a translation of 50 units in the x-direction. - 将纹理画笔的变换矩阵与矩阵相乘。Multiplies the matrix with the transformation matrix of the texture brush. - 填充的矩形，使用纹理画笔。Fills a rectangle, using the texture brush. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的`Paint`事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 纹理将图像旋转 90 度。Rotates the texture image by 90 degrees. - 填充的矩形。Fills a rectangle. - 将转换矩阵重置为标识。Resets the transformation matrix to identity. - 填充第二个矩形。Fills a second rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的`Paint`事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 将纹理图像放大通过两次沿 x 方向。Scales the texture image by two times in the x-direction. - 填充的矩形使用纹理画笔在屏幕上。Fills a rectangle on the screen, using the texture brush. summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的副本，该对象为与此 对象关联的图像定义局部几何变换。

span.span: Gets or sets a copy of the object that defines a local geometric transformation for the image associated with this object.

value.span: 用于定义几何变换的 对象的副本，该变换仅适用于通过此 对象绘制的填充。

span.span: A copy of the object that defines a geometric transformation that applies only to fills drawn by using this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用几何转换以转换、 缩放、 旋转或扭曲定义此画笔的纹理的图像。A geometric transformation can be used to translate, scale, rotate, or skew the image that defines the texture of this brush. 因为返回的矩阵和通过属性是画笔的几何转换的副本，所以不再需要时应释放的矩阵。Because the matrix returned and by the property is a copy of the brush's geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.

summary.span: 按指定顺序将此 对象的局部几何转换平移指定的尺寸。

span.span: Translates the local geometric transformation of this object by the specified dimensions in the specified order.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取新位图使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to obtain a new bitmap using the method. 它还演示了属性和枚举。It also demonstrates the property and the enumeration. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建包含名为 Button2 的按钮的窗体。Create a form containing a button named Button2. 将代码粘贴到窗体并将 Button2_Click 方法与按钮的`Click`事件。Paste the code into the form and associate the Button2_Click method with the button's `Click` event. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ImageExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/VB/form1.vb#2)]
